events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it because it does not fit and I would like a full refund.
The case has been categorized as Refund due to customer's request for money back on the jacket purchase.
Support agent Alex has been assigned to handle this refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and still in its original packaging?
My order number is 12345678. The jacket is unopened and still sealed in the original packaging as I received it.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund process. You will receive the refund in 5-7 business days once we receive the returned jacket.
Thanks for the quick response. I’m happy to hear the refund is being processed so fast.
The refund case has been resolved. Please ship the jacket back to the return address included in your order confirmation.
Just following up to confirm that your refund was processed successfully. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the refund has been confirmed and no further issues reported, we are closing this case now.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback is appreciated.
